pull.title: tests: Remove no longer needed UBSan suppressions (issues fixed). Add documentation.
pull.body:
Remove no longer needed UBSan suppressions (issues fixed). Add documentation.

This PR is the CI-only subset of #17208 (which touches code).

From a fuzzing perspective it would be really nice to be able to run UBSan with as few suppressions as possible :)

events.message: tests: Remove no longer needed UBSan suppressions (issues fixed). Add documentation.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17208](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17208.html) (Make all tests pass UBSan without using any UBSan suppressions by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
